# include <iostream>
# include <vector>
# include <cstdio>

using namespace std;


int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf ("%d",&t);
	while (t--)
	{
		int n,m,p,q,s;
		scanf ("%d %d %d %d %d",&n,&m,&s,&p,&q);

		int ans=0;
		int st_v=m-1;
		int st_r=m-1;
		int cur_v=1;
		int cur_r=1;
		int cr= n-m+1;
		for (int i=0;i<s;i++)
		{
			if (st_v/p != 0)
			{
				cur_v+=p;
				st_v-=p;
			}
			else
			{
				if (st_v!=0)
				{
					cur_v = (p-st_v)%cr + m;
					st_v=0;
				}
				else
				{
					cur_v= ((cur_v-m+p)%cr) + m;
				}
			}

			if (st_r/q != 0)
			{
				cur_r+=q;
				st_r-=q;
			}
			else
			{
				if (st_r!=0)
				{
					cur_r = (q-st_r)%cr + m;
					st_r=0;
				}
				else
				{
					cur_r= ((cur_r-m+q)%cr) + m;
				}
			}
			//printf ("virat= %d rohit= %d\n",cur_v,cur_r);
			if (cur_v==cur_r)
				ans++;
		}
		printf ("%d\n",ans);

	}
}
